versions.changelog:
Initial release of JSenseBoard firmware
- Full 16-channel LED control with FastLED
- WiFi network management with multi-profile support
- Web-based configuration interface
- RTC support with multiple time sources
- OLED display with multiple screen modes
- Multi-sensor support (accelerometer, gyroscope, environmental)
- JBoard network for synchronized multi-board control
- Sequence playback and effects management
- OTA firmware update support
- Configuration import/export
